name: Opennote
long_description:
Opennote is building an interactive AI tutor that gives every student a truly personalized learning experience.

Most students never get to engage deeply with material in traditional classrooms or generic online tools. Opennote changes that by acting as a human-like, intuitive tutorâ€”one that remembers your progress and adapts every session to how you learn best.
one_liner: The Interactive AI Tutor That Knows You
